description: Thanks to the Lord of Terror events, the contract between Belldandy and Keiichi has been conveniently lost, and Kami-sama will recall Belldandy soon. Lind is tasked with attempting to recover the audio file if possible. Upon doing this, the phrase he used to make his wish has to be spoken by Keiichi but he doesn`t remember the exact wording.

titles.title: Ah, faîtes que mon voeu se réalise une seconde fois
ああっ願いよ もう一度っ
